title: Apple’s excellent dual USB-C power adapter is twice as nice for $20 off
content:
Macworld

It’s pretty annoying these days that when you pay so much money for tech, they don’t even give you a power adapter to plug that cable in. This makes this particular Apple deal much more attractive since the 35W dual USB-C port compact power adapter is down to $40, its best price yet.

With an MSRP of $59, the Apple 35W Dual USB-C port compact power adapter is perfect for anyone who wants to charge multiple devices simultaneously, whether at home or at the office. It’ll fast-charge an iPhone or Apple Watch and even has enough juice to fill up a MacBook Air.

As the name suggests, the gadget has two USB-C ports so you can plug in both your iPhone and MacBook for instance without relying on pass-through or separate plugs. The adapter is pretty compact and features folding prongs, so it’s easier to pack and store without taking up too much space when traveling or in your laptop bag.

Of course, it’s not just Apple gear you can charge with this one, but other gadgets too, making for a versatile purchase. Keep in mind that the price only covers the power adapter so you’d still need cables, so you can buy those separately.

So go ahead and add this Apple 35W dual USB-C port compact power adapter to your cart and start charging multiple devices at once.
